formatted_address: 4 Dairy Farm Ln, #01-16 Dairy Farm Mall, Singapore 677622
name: Flair Studio

reviews.text: I‚Äôm the follower of kino , he is a vr pro hairdresser that more that 15 years experience.always never let me down after my hair cut . Actually all hairdresser here r vr pro n experience. Like Vicky  / and Ice also in tis line for 15 years . Do remember to make apt before u come . Be more patient when u waiting to cut yr hair  coz u also dun want they cut yr hair in a rush . Thx kino always keep my hair neat  n healthy . Thumbs up for Fair service,  which comforts environment, drink servings.

First time visiting Flair studio at Dairy Farm Mall, and had my first haircut with stylist Ice. 100% satisfied with the experience. Ice did an amazing job, perfectly capturing the style that I showed in the picture. I love his attention to details and patience!
Kino is good hairstylist.   Staff here very friendly and  polite. ( Kino and friend Ice). Thank  you.

I had an absolute transformation to my hair. Kino is truly an expert. All it took was for him to understand my hair the cut and he was a pro after that. In love with the highlights and the colour he mentioned. What an incredible ability to get hair care and the final impression.

I had an amazing experience with Kino. His knowledge and skills are truly impressive. Not only did he create a hairstyle I absolutely love, but his friendly and approachable nature made the whole experience even better. He took the time to listen, offered expert advice, and handled everything with great professionalism and attention to detail. Highly recommend! üëçüëçüëç
